meanings.sent1: She wore a gaud around her neck that sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The gaud on the bracelet caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The gaud on his keychain was so bright, it almost blinded me.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with colorful gauds that reflected her vibrant personality.
meanings.sent5: The gaud on her dress was so extravagant, it stole the spotlight.

meanings.definition: A cheap, showy piece of jewelry
meanings.sent1: He bought her a gaud from the flea market as a gift.
meanings.sent2: The street vendor sold colorful gauds at a low price.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly referred to the plastic gaud as her 'treasure'.
meanings.sent4: The gaud she wore looked like it belonged in a costume jewelry box.
meanings.sent5: The gaud he wore on his finger was so flashy, it drew attention from afar.

meanings.definition: Something showy but without real value
meanings.sent1: The gaud she won at the fair was made of plastic.
meanings.sent2: His collection of gauds cluttered the shelf but held sentimental value.
meanings.sent3: The gaud he proudly displayed turned out to be a fake diamond.
meanings.sent4: The gauds she collected over the years were all shiny but worthless.
meanings.sent5: The gauds she wore were like glittering reminders of her past adventures.
